Message.Title: It's Fabulous Friday
Message.Msg: It's a great day to do Ebay
ROTFLMAO Being an Ebay seller sometimes I forget what day of the week it is In fact this happens more than I want to admit to :-)

I don't forget what day of the week it is because selling on Amazon I get a break from shipping packages on the weekend. Same amount of items on Amazon and eBay but Amazon trumps eBay 5:1. Heck, even some of my smaller sites are now starting to rival eBay.
Starbucks? Hell, he's more likely at McDonalds for the free wifi. One Starbucks latte is half his eBay profit for the week. At least at McDonalds he can order from the 99 cent value menu.

Topic.Title: I Smile When Ebay Is Red

Message.Msg: I agree. My biggest dilemma is which car or motorcycle to drive today or if I want to take the boat out. Last year, we bought the house next door, just for the garage space !! The darn boat costs $700 per month to keep it at the marina and it's $1K in gas just to go out for a two day cruise. Oh, the problems of having money.
John, don't worry, it only gets better. at least when you're in jail, you get three meals per day.
I've never traveled on the Amazon Bought 1 item there back in 2000, a Linksys Wireless Router Never had a reason to do business over there. . .
You know me well ~ LOL
